data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of San Pedro de Macorís to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic.
Father, you gave the church of San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of San Pedro de Macorís to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Japanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, of the 250,270 people in the state of San Pedro de Macorís who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.focus_label: San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
